faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Why should businesses outsource VAT & tax consultancy services?
items.answer: Outsourcing VAT and tax consultancy services can help businesses save costs and time spent crafting invoices, chasing approvals, and ensuring compliance.

items.question: Do foreign companies pay VAT in Dubai, UAE?
items.answer: Yes, all goods entering the Emirates are subject to 5-15% VAT, depending on your location, business structure, and type of product.

items.question: Do I need to provide any documents to One Nexuz for onboarding my team?
items.answer: Our tax advisors will request your unique taxpayer identification number, recent tax returns, income statements, and proof of expenses to create accurate reports and file taxes fully compliant with the ZATCA and FTA.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help reclaim VAT on previous records?
items.answer: Yes, if you have eligible input VAT that wasn’t claimed, our experts will review your past records and file on your behalf.

items.question: How do I know if my business is overpaying VAT?
items.answer: Our expert tax consultants conduct periodic health checks to assess your current compliance, identify potential risks, and pinpoint missed opportunities to ensure every dirham is reclaimed.
